org.openmap4u.commons

Interface Drawable<S extends Styleable<S>>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - The style type for the drawable.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Buildable<S,B>, ImageDrawable, ShapeDrawable, TextDrawable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractConnector, AreaChart, AreaChart.Horizontal, AreaChart.Vertical, BarChart, Circle, Cross, Image, ImageBuilder, Line, Line.Horizontal, Line.Vertical, LineChart, PieChart, Polygon, Polyline, Rectangle, ShapeBuilder, Text, TextBuilder

    public interface Drawable<S extends Styleable<S>>
    Author:
    hadrbolec
